entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rock River

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25 except minus 35 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 25 except minus 35 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31 except minus 40 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 31 except minus 40 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few clouds. High minus 29 except minus 35 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Near blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 29 except minus 35 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
